name: Poms
description: POMS is a comedy about a group of women who form a cheerleading squad at their retirement community, proving that you're never too old to 'bring it!'

review.author: tiagocampos-02918
review.heading: Not my kind of movie! But...
review.reviewBody: I went to the theatre to watch this just to keep my family company. I expected to be bored for an hour and a half. This is not an epic movie with an epic story. Doesn't have award winning roles or a genius comedy. But it has such a good vibe to it and somewhat of a lesson to be learned for both youngsters and the elderly. I had to give it a good rating. I enjoyed this way more than I ever thought.

keywords: cheer squad,one word title,youtube video,title directed by female,female friendship
